name: Knockdown Heroes
description:
Battle, brawl and clash your way through medieval 1v1 PVP battle arenas in Knockdown Heroes! Choose your hero, team up with your friends, brawl with other players in real-time and climb the leaderboards to become one of the top players in the world!

COLLECT & CHOOSE YOUR HERO
Collect and choose from 9 diverse heroes, each sporting a distinct fighting style, to find the perfect fit for you. Take control of the slow but tough Viking, the well-rounded but fashionable Hoplite or the extra-winded but merry executioner K.A.T., among others, and smash your enemies to dust.

COMPETE IN PVP BATTLES
Brawl against other players in Real-time PVP Multiplayer. Use your hero's skills in fast paced combat to attack at the right moment with a decisive charge and drive your opponent into the ground!

UPGRADE & CUSTOMIZE HEROES
Collect Skills, Buffs and Spells from battles and chests. Unlock and upgrade powerful new abilities and equip them to give your hero special abilities. Find the best combination for each hero to win.

DOMINATE MULTIPLE ARENAS
Dominate the arena to stay on the top. Make sure to upgrade your heroes, use the arena environment to your advantage, pick up speed at the “ropes”, then charge your enemy into oblivion! Experiment with your Spell deck, look out for arena traps, hone your skills and most importantly do what it takes to win!

CLIMB THE LEADERBOARDS
Acquire trophies from battles to rank up and climb the leaderboards. How will you rank globally or against your friends?

LEAD YOUR CLAN TO VICTORY
Create your clan, choose your crest, recruit your friends, and battle other clans for dominance. Request assistance from your clanmates, discuss strategy in your clan's chatroom, and challenge teammates in friendly combat.

MORE FEATURES:
• Real-Time PVP Multiplayer
• Daily Login Rewards
• Season Pass
• Daily Offers
• Chat
• Leaderboards
• Friends List
• Collect unique emotes
• Daily Spins
• Limited Time Events
• Quests & Rewards
• Experience Road
• Simple Controls
• More to Come!

Up to the challenge? Download Knockdown Heroes now!

Knockdown Heroes is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. If you want to limit this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.
